      • optResourceEnabled

        public DefaultDnsServiceDiscovererBuilder optResourceEnabled​(boolean optResourceEnabled)
        Enable the automatic inclusion of a optional records that tries to give the remote DNS server a hint about how much data the resolver can read per response. Some DNSServer may not support this and so fail to answer queries. If you find problems you may want to disable this.
        Parameters:
        optResourceEnabled - if optional records inclusion is enabled.
        Returns:
        this.

      • invalidateHostsOnDnsFailure

        public DefaultDnsServiceDiscovererBuilder invalidateHostsOnDnsFailure​(java.util.function.Predicate<java.lang.Throwable> invalidateHostsOnDnsFailure)
        Allows sending 'unavailable' events for all current active hosts for particular DNS errors.

        Note: The default does not send 'unavailable' events when a DNS lookup times out.

        Parameters:
        invalidateHostsOnDnsFailure - determines whether or not to send 'unavailable' events.
        Returns:
        this.

      • noRetriesOnDnsFailures

        public DefaultDnsServiceDiscovererBuilder noRetriesOnDnsFailures()
        Do not perform retries if DNS lookup fails. Instead, terminate the Publisher with the error.
        Returns:
        this.

      • appendFilter

        public DefaultDnsServiceDiscovererBuilder appendFilter​(ServiceDiscovererFilterFactory<java.lang.String,​java.net.InetAddress,​ServiceDiscovererEvent<java.net.InetAddress>> factory)
        Append the filter to the chain of filters used to decorate the ServiceDiscoverer created by this builder.

        Note this method will be used to decorate the result of build()/buildInetDiscoverer() before it is returned to the user.

        The order of execution of these filters are in order of append. If 3 filters are added as follows: 

             builder.append(filter1).append(filter2).append(filter3)
        making a request to a service discoverer wrapped by this filter chain the order of invocation of these filters will be: 
             filter1 => filter2 => filter3 => service discoverer
        Parameters:
        factory - ServiceDiscovererFilterFactory to decorate a ServiceDiscoverer for the purpose of filtering.
        Returns:
        this

      • ioExecutor

        public DefaultDnsServiceDiscovererBuilder ioExecutor​(IoExecutor ioExecutor)
        Sets the IoExecutor.
        Parameters:
        ioExecutor - IoExecutor to use.
        Returns:
        this.
